passive.name: LIVING VENGEANCE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) LIVING VENGEANCE
                                Gains 60% Attack Speed for 5/6/7/8s on a champion kill or assist, 30% on non-champion kills.

q.name: (Q) PIERCING ARROW
q.description:
(Q) PIERCING ARROW
 15/14/13/12s   75 
                                
                                
                                Hold: Draws the bow, gradually increasing the range and damage for the next shot. Movement Speed is slowed by 20% while preparing to shoot.Release: Fires the arrow, dealing 93 to 139 physical damage (20/70/120/170 + 125%  to 30/105/180/255 + 187.5% ), reduced by 15% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks on at least one enemy champion.Piercing Arrow fails if not released after 4 seconds, but will refund 50% of its Mana cost.
notes: range and damage for the next shot

w.name: (W) BLIGHTED QUIVER
w.description:
(W) BLIGHTED QUIVER
 22/20/18/16s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Attacks deal 12 bonus magic damage (12/16/20/24 + 20% ) and apply Blight for 6 seconds (stacks 3 times). Varus's other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to 5% (5/5.5/6/6.5 + 1% ) of the target's max Health per stack.Active: Doubles the bonus on hit damage from Blighted Quiver's passive for 6 seconds. The next Piercing Arrow deals bonus magic damage equal to 8% to 16% () of the target's missing Health, increase by 0% - 100% (based on Piercing Arrow's channel time).

e.name: (E) HAIL OF ARROWS
e.description:
(E) HAIL OF ARROWS
 13/12/11/10s   80 
                                
                                
                                Fires a hail of arrows that deals 70 physical damage (70/115/160/205 + 90% bonus ) and desecrates the ground for 4 seconds. Desecrated ground slows enemies by 25% and applies 40% Grievous Wounds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

r.name: (R) CHAIN OF CORRUPTION
r.description:
(R) CHAIN OF CORRUPTION
 65/55/45s   100 
                                
                                
                                Flings out a tendril of corruption that deals 150 magic damage (150/250/350 + 85% ) and roots the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds.The corruption then spreads toward nearby enemy champions, also immobilizing them on contact. Immobilized units gain 3 Blight stacks over the next 3 seconds.
